statements: SELECT * FROM ab_testing_emails;
SELECT subject_line, conversion_rate FROM ab_testing_emails;
SELECT id, email_design FROM ab_testing_emails WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM ab_testing_emails WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT subject_line, email_design FROM ab_testing_emails ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT id, subject_line FROM ab_testing_emails WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM ab_testing_emails WHERE email_design LIKE '%modern%' ORDER BY subject_line ASC;
SELECT id, subject_line, conversion_rate FROM ab_testing_emails WHERE conversion_rate < 0.3 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC, id ASC;
SELECT id, email_design FROM ab_testing_emails WHERE subject_line = 'Welcome Email';
SELECT subject_line, conversion_rate FROM ab_testing_emails WHERE conversion_rate BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC, subject_line ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM subject_lines;
SELECT subject_line_text FROM subject_lines WHERE subject_line_id = 1;
SELECT subject_line_text, subject_line_id FROM subject_lines ORDER BY subject_line_id DESC;
SELECT design_text FROM email_designs;
SELECT subject_line_text AS 'Subject', design_text AS 'Design' FROM subject_lines JOIN email_designs ON subject_lines.subject_line_id = email_designs.design_id;
SELECT * FROM subject_lines ORDER BY subject_line_id DESC;
SELECT subject_line_text FROM subject_lines WHERE subject_line_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM subject_lines JOIN email_designs ON subject_line_id = design_id;
SELECT subject_line_text, design_text FROM subject_lines, email_designs WHERE subject_line_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM subject_lines WHERE subject_line_text LIKE '%important%' AND subject_line_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM subject_lines;
SELECT design_name, design_content FROM email_designs WHERE id = 5;
SELECT subject_line FROM subject_lines WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, design_name FROM email_designs ORDER BY design_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate) AS average_conversion_rate FROM conversion_rates;
SELECT subject_line FROM subject_lines WHERE id = 1
SELECT design_name, design_content FROM email_designs WHERE id > 5 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM email_designs WHERE design_name LIKE '%welcome%' AND design_content IS NOT NULL

SELECT s.subject_line, e.design_name, c.conversion_rate FROM subject_lines s JOIN conversion_rates c ON s.id = c.subject_line_id JOIN email_designs e ON c.design_id = e.id WHERE c.conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY c.conversion_rate DESC

SELECT s.subject_line, COUNT(c.id) AS conversion_count FROM subject_lines s LEFT JOIN conversion_rates c ON s.id = c.subject_line_id GROUP BY s.id HAVING COUNT(c.id) >= 3 ORDER BY conversion_count DESC
SELECT * FROM ab_tests_subject_lines;
SELECT subject_line_id, subject_line FROM ab_tests_subject_lines ORDER BY subject_line_id DESC;
SELECT email_design_id, email_design FROM ab_tests_email_designs WHERE email_design_id = 3;
SELECT subject_line_id, email_design_id, conversion_rate FROM ab_tests_results WHERE conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT test_id, subject_line_id, email_design_id, test_date FROM ab_tests_history WHERE test_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY test_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ab_tests_subject_lines;
SELECT subject_line FROM ab_tests_subject_lines WHERE subject_line_id = 1;
SELECT subject_line FROM ab_tests_subject_lines ORDER BY subject_line_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ab_tests_email_designs WHERE email_design_id = 2;
SELECT email_design FROM ab_tests_email_designs WHERE email_design LIKE '%special%';
SELECT * FROM subject_lines;
SELECT id, design_name FROM email_designs WHERE design_type = 'A/B Test';
SELECT experiment_name, end_date FROM experiments ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT email FROM participants WHERE group_id = 1 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT experiment_id, AVG(conversion_rate) AS average_conversion_rate FROM results GROUP BY experiment_id;
SELECT * FROM subject_lines ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT design_name, design_type FROM email_designs WHERE design_type = 'A/B Test';
SELECT experiment_name, start_date, end_date FROM experiments WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT email FROM participants WHERE group_id = 2 ORDER BY id LIMIT 10;

SELECT experiment_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS participant_count, AVG(conversion_rate) AS avg_conversion_rate FROM participants JOIN results ON participants.id = results.participant_id JOIN experiments ON participants.experiment_id = experiments.id GROUP BY experiment_name HAVING avg_conversion_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY participant_count DESC;
